items.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Trump calls for Iran's 'UNCONDITIONAL SURRENDER'
items.description: Iran and Israel continued to exchange attacks into Tuesday amid the latest round of conflict between the two nations.

items.title: Sen. Mike Lee faces criticism over posts on Minnesota shooting
items.description: Republican Sen. Mike Lee is facing criticism over his social media posts about the assassination of a Minnesota lawmaker and her husband.

items.title: R. Kelly hospitalized after alleged overdose in prison, attorneys say
items.description: The disgraced R&B singer is currently serving a 30-year prison sentence.
